collections.description: A rogue catalog of protocol operatives, vault ghosts, and order-breaking enforcers — each one captured mid-chaos like a GPK card forged inside a digital underworld. CONTINENTAL WICK is a collector’s vault of cinematic-grade vectors, glitch-world personalities, and protocol anomalies that refuse to be domesticated. Every card is a snapshot of disorder wearing a badge of precision. This is where the protocol stores its legends — and its mistakes.
